markdownRemark.html: I recently had the chance to work with some Airbnb data from Portland. My main aim behind this visualisation was to use standard functionality, no tricks or loopholes but deliver a dashabord that simulated as much of the Airbnb experience as I could. It’s not 100% but there is one virtue, you must always follow when building a dashabord, at some point you just have to ship it, it’s all too easy to keep building and tweaking.

frontmatter.description: I recently had the chance to work with some data from AirBnB. For the viz I built i just tried to use standard features and apply some AirBnb branding.
frontmatter.title: Airbnb Portland Tableau Dashboard
